passages.name: West of House
passages.original:
This is an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front door. A mailbox is here.

[[NORTH->North of House]]
[[SOUTH->South of House]]
[[WEST->Forest]]
passages.text: This is an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front door.

passages.name: North of House
passages.original:
You are facing the north side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are barred.

[[WEST->West of House]]
[[EAST->East of House]]
[[NORTH->Forest]]
passages.text: You are facing the north side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are barred.

passages.name: South of House
passages.original:
You are facing the south side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are barred.

[[WEST->West of House]]
[[EAST->East of House]]
[[SOUTH->Forest]]
passages.text: You are facing the south side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are barred.

passages.name: Forest
passages.original:
This is a forest, with trees in all directions around you.

[[NORTH->Sunlit Forest]]
[[EAST->Forest]]
[[SOUTH->Forest]]
[[WEST->Forest]]
passages.text: This is a forest, with trees in all directions around you.

passages.name: East of House
passages.original:
You are behind the white house. A path leads into the forest to the east. In one corner of the house there is a small window which is slightly ajar.

[[NORTH->North of House]]
[[SOUTH->South of House]]
[[EAST->Sunlit Forest]]
[[WEST->Kitchen]]
[[ENTER->Kitchen]]
passages.text: You are behind the white house. A path leads into the forest to the east. In one corner of the house there is a small window which is slightly ajar.

passages.name: Sunlit Forest
passages.original:
This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around. One particularly large tree with some low branches stands here.

[[NORTH->Forest]]
[[SOUTH->Forest]]
[[EAST->Forest]]
[[WEST->East of House]]
[[UP->Tree]]
passages.text: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around. One particularly large tree with some low branches stands here.

passages.name: Kitchen
passages.original:
You are in the kitchen of the white house. A table seems to have been used recently for the preparation of food. A passage leads to the west and a dark staircase can be seen leading upward. A dark chimney leads down and to the east is a small window which is open.

[[EAST->East of House]]
passages.text: You are in the kitchen of the white house. A table seems to have been used recently for the preparation of food. A passage leads to the west and a dark staircase can be seen leading upward. A dark chimney leads down and to the east is a small window which is open.

passages.name: Tree
passages.original:
You are about 10 feet above the ground nestled among some large branches. The nearest branch above you is above your reach. Beside you on the branch is a small bird's nest.

[[DOWN->Sunlit Forest]]
passages.text: You are about 10 feet above the ground nestled among some large branches. The nearest branch above you is above your reach. Beside you on the branch is a small bird's nest.

passages.name: Forest
passages.original:
This is a forest, with trees in all directions around you.

[[NORTH->Sunlit Forest]]
[[EAST->Forest]]
[[SOUTH->Forest]]
[[WEST->Forest]]
passages.text: This is a forest, with trees in all directions around you.
